title: The Film Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama CD   Celebrities   Modern Day   Showbiz
author: Man Man He Qi Duo   漫漫何其多
description:
Jiang Chi was a popular idol actor and 'little fresh meat' in the entertainment industry. In order to get closer to his unrequited love, the Film Emperor Ye Lan, he decided to join the cast of the gay arthouse movie, Scum -- even if it meant he would not get paid.

The Film Emperor Ye Lan was an award-winning actor who had enjoyed many years of popularity and praise. Although he was outgoing and easy to get along with, he maintained a distance from all the other celebrities in the circle. Only after meeting his cute fanboy, Jiang Chi, did he start breaking his own rules...

A humorous and super cute mutual chasing story, with a hardcore fanboy MC and a sexy scoundrel ML.>
